chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: A small insect can spread a big virus... This is the problem in life. We get what we want very easily. We stop valuing it.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: So what is it? Biodiversity or biological diversity is immensely rich in wildlife and cultivated species.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Biodiversity is immensely rich in wildlife and cultivated species, diverse in form and functions, but closely integrated in a system through multiple networks of interdependencies.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Biodiversity means life. Diversity means diversity. From small insects to big whales, all forms of life are included.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Plants and animals are diverse in form and function but closely integrated with each other.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: A fish is different from a monkey, but both are important for their ecosystems.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Humans, animals, and plants are different but live together in the environment.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: All living beings are closely integrated through networks of interdependencies.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: We are connected to nature because of our needs. This is biodiversity.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Flora means plant life and fauna means animal life.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Different regions have unique plants and animals.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: India is one of the world's richest countries in terms of biological diversity.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Many species are still undiscovered in forests and oceans.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Insects alone have millions of species.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: The diversity we see today is only a fraction of what exists.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Flora and fauna are essential for our daily life.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: We often take nature for granted.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Because of insensitivity, flora and fauna are under stress.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: This raises concern about conservation.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Resources will be depleted if taken for granted.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Conservation of forest and wildlife is essential.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Wildlife population is declining rapidly.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Conservation preserves ecological diversity and life support systems.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: It maintains water, air, and soil.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Conservation also preserves genetic diversity.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Genetic diversity is important for breeding and growth of species.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Traditional breeds and species must be protected.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Conservation ensures original genetic traits are not lost.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Agriculture and fisheries depend on biological diversity.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Healthy ecosystems ensure food security.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Aquatic biodiversity supports different types of fisheries.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: Conservation preserves life support systems and genetic diversity.

chunks.title: Biodiversity of INDIA What is Biodiversity and Why is it Important
chunks.text: This explains why conservation is important.

full_text: A small insect can spread a big virus... This is the problem in life. We get what we want very easily. We stop valuing it. So what is it? Biodiversity or biological diversity is immensely rich in wildlife and cultivated species. Biodiversity is immensely rich in wildlife and cultivated species, diverse in form and functions, but closely integrated in a system through multiple networks of interdependencies. What is the meaning of biodiversity? Biodiversity means life Diversity means diversity So how much diversity is there in that life? Right? From small insects to big whales So here it is said Diverse form and function of species Biodiversity means That which is immensely Diverse Diverse Diverse Diverse We get to see rich wildlife and vegetation which we get to see different types of animals and plants which are diverse in form and function which are different from each other in their structure and way of working but are closely integrated in a system but have a very close relationship with each other But are closely integrated in a system through multiple networks of interdependencies It means that a fish is very different from a monkey But for an aquatic ecosystem, fish is very important The monkey is very important for the ecosystem A monkey and a human and a fish are all different But they live together in the environment and only then things work A tree and a human are different but the tree gives food to the human and the human plants the tree So, we all, whether it is a plant or an animal We all are diverse in our forms and functions But we are closely integrated How are we closely integrated? Through multiple network of interdependencies We are connected to nature because of our needs. So this is biodiversity. Now if we understand here, then here it is given flora and fauna topic. What does flora mean? Flora means flower. You can write flowers or you can write plant life. but I write plant life plant life and fauna means fauna means you you means human no you means animal human is also an animal so what will happen here plant life animals What do we call animals? We call it fauna If you look around, you will be able to find that there are some animals and plants which are unique in your area In fact, India is one of the world's richest countries in terms of its vast area of biological diversity. magnitude, type, so India is one of those countries where different types of trees, birds, animals, plants are found. There are millions of species in those insects. So this is possibly twice or thrice the number yet to be discovered. You may have realized the importance of these resources in our daily life. These diverse flora and fauna are so well integrated in our daily life that we take these for granted. But because of this, they are under great stress mainly due to the insensitivity to our environment. The importance of Flora and Fauna has been told, there is diversity in India, we have not discovered a lot, our life is so integrated. If you take flora and fauna for granted, then those resources are not going to be the same. They will be depleted. We have to think about conservation of forest and wildlife. Conservation in the background of rapid decline in wildlife population has become essential. Conservation preserves ecological diversity and our life support system, water, air and soil. Conservation is important because it maintains ecological diversity, water, air and soil. It also preserves the genetic diversity of plants and animals. Genetic diversity is important for better growth of species and breeding. Traditional breeds and indigenous species must be protected. Conservation ensures original genetic traits are not lost. Agriculture and fisheries depend on biological diversity. Healthy ecosystems ensure food security. Aquatic biodiversity supports different types of fisheries. Conservation preserves life support systems and genetic diversity. This explains why conservation is important.
